website_summaries.verdict: Its adjustable draw weight and customizable options make this a bow that beginners can grow with.
pros: Very beginner-friendly, with a wide adjustment rate
Great for target shooting or hunting
Included accessories are a nice plus
cons: Included sight is okay, but can be replaced
Needs quite a bit of adjustment to fit user’s needs

customer_reviews.title: Please get it serviced before firing or drawing back
customer_reviews.text: The bow itself is good after a few shots but initially came with very poor measurements set on it. I don't know a ton about tuning up bows so I took it to a certified dealer and they were astounded that the bow was shipped to me as it was. I had already done some practice draws as I was pretty pumped to finally have the bow in hand but since the bow was set incorrectly out of the box I very easily could have bent or snapped a limb when drawing it back. This is a very dangerous way to ship so please get it checked out before making any practice draws as to prevent serious injury.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Love but sad it broke...
customer_reviews.text: Went in for this now because I largely didn't have the funds to purchase the bow I wanted. I loved it for what it was! Great reviews and highly recommended for sub 500 dollar compounds. Though after a few weeks of very consistent shooting, the bottom cam broke. The knob that held the string look just snapped off. I didn't dry fire it at all. It's costing me 160 to get the parts and bow repaired, which at that point I feel like I should have just shelled up more cash up front and went for the powermax
customer_reviews.author: Scribbles

customer_reviews.title: great bow
customer_reviews.text: This is the greatest bow ever made, it is perfect for me anyway. Will be using for deer season later in the year, already bagged two turkeys and a few ground hogs......
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love this bow. Absolutely no issues. The kit does not include the release, but that was expected. We bought arrows and tips. We went to a hunting gear store and got it adjusted to my weight and draw length. All of the adjusting did not cost much. Release and arrows with adjustments cost maybe $150. Shoots very well and accurately. I am a beginner and I feel very good about my shooting already with this bow.draw weight is very adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Wallis Mead

customer_reviews.title: not beginer friendly, poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: a few things i am upset with already. in order for me to contact the seller i have to go through leaps and bounds. this is my 3rd time writing this, whisker basket whiskers are bent 3 sight sights, one of them is bent, one of them is imperfect the levels glue came off, floating around in the bag and arrived late in my opinion... i am pretty upset, i paid how much for this kind of quality? all my ad ons are messed up in some way or another. bow is nice, uncomfortable to hold. i will reach out about the add ons, my real only gripe.
customer_reviews.author: reviewman

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: This is my second review after my first was rejected by amazon for some reason. Product arrived on time, well packaged. The only thing different than pictured is the peep sight is not pre-installed so you will need to take this to a pro-shop or learn how to install it yourself. Got this for my wife as a birthday gift, she loves the light weight and adjust-ability of this product.
customer_reviews.author: SOSLLC

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with it and so is he
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bow for my 8 year old son over the holidays. I am very happy with it and so is he. It is super easy to adjust draw length, weight, and optics set up on your own as it does not require a bow press. I just needed 2 Allen wrenches, waxed linen cord and YouTube. It is very versatile and I expect it to last him for years to come, or until he wants an upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this bow. There are not a ton of bows that are suited for less than buff ladies, but this is a great option. It's super adjustable and great quality. If you get more into archery you made end up upgrading some of the accessories (at my pull weight, the pinhole scope is almost useless at distances greater than 20ft, and the wisker basket is ok for hunting I'm told, but not ideal for target shooting, for a couple of examples), but the package is completely adequate for a beginner. And you can't beat the price for such a great bow.
customer_reviews.author: Hayley Rowan

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I'm no bow expert, but this thing seems really nice. Got it for my son for Christmas who's only ever shot a recurve. Took it to a pro shop to have it adjusted for him (this took quite a while and got fairly expensive with all the little things added, but I think it was worth it). He really likes it and it shoots really well. Appears to be well built. He hasn't used it much, I will update this review if we have any issues in the future.
customer_reviews.author: pumpkinboss

customer_reviews.title: Great bow for any level shooter..
customer_reviews.text: This set-up is so cool.....I'm a beginner and I was comfortable with this bow right away. I'm a big guy so heavy setting feels great.
customer_reviews.author: dennis d gant

customer_reviews.title: My husband and son love it. My husband was concerned about the quality ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband and son love it. My husband was concerned about the quality of the sight. He is very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Bow
customer_reviews.text: As a beginner, I was overwhelmed with all the different options online and in stores until I found this bow. It’s light, comfortable, balanced, and accurate (so far)! My only complaint is that I will have to buy a new site sooner than expected, as the current one is hard to see in different lighting. Overall great product - would buy again! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: ~Country Mom~

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, adjustable, and a good bow
customer_reviews.text: Nearly perfect, once tuned by a bow store. Two problems: it's way to heavy i'd say about 4 LBS which starts to hurt after holding it for 10 minutes. Second: the grip is not ergonomic which means it's not made to fit your hand comfortably, the grip hurts over time. Other than that: accurate bow. You might be able to get a more comfortable and lighter bow for a similar amount of money.
customer_reviews.author: A.M.

customer_reviews.title: Do not order bow off amazon! Go to dealer be sized correctly!
customer_reviews.text: Left handed parts on a right handed bow, box even said left handed! Screws on bow were cross threaded, in general do not order this off Amazon! Very disappointed with how bad of shape bow was in when received.
customer_reviews.author: chad garfield

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bow
customer_reviews.text: I have been very pleased with this bow. It is so adjustable, I have bought 3 in the last month or so. One for my 10 year old, my wife, and myself. Incredibly adjustable, very smooth, and well put together.
customer_reviews.author: SkyBlue

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bow! Purchased for my daughter(10 yrs old) to grow into. Has worked out great. Sights are very basic, but they work for now. Will upgrade sight as she gets better. It’s nice that the bow draw length and weight are adjustable. I took it to a local archery shop and they fitted everything to her size. She can use it for several years as she grows and improves. Highly recommended for kids that are past “kiddie” bow stage.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Tunstall

customer_reviews.title: Never shot one before love this one
customer_reviews.text: Got mine for thugs. The training arrow goes right thru drywall and between quarter and half inch hardwood or easily thru straw target and quarter inch plywood from about 10 feet. I then bought hunting arrow tipe. Confident I could hit a moving target 20 feet away. I m pretty sure it's on a low setting. Didnt adjust anything.
customer_reviews.author: tech guy dm

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: The bow came with a broken cam and a broken string also missing some parts. So that kinda sucked
customer_reviews.author: Angel Aguayo

customer_reviews.title: an awesome bow, I changed out the arrow rest and ...
customer_reviews.text: an awesome bow, I changed out the arrow rest and sight to ones i like more. shot great out of the box, but i just prefer a whisker biscuit rest and trophy ridge 5 pin sight. its comfortable. pretty easy to adjust the draw length.
customer_reviews.author: gerald casperson

customer_reviews.title: It's lightweight and easy to pull back
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my Husband and he absolutely loves it. It's lightweight and easy to pull back. He says it's much smoother than his other bow was. Even his Dad had no issues with it and he has a broken/mended wrong right arm.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Lotta bow for price.
customer_reviews.text: Got this bow for my boy. It's really helped him improve his shot placement. Super light and quiet. No problems with the bow yet. Setup was pretty simple. Great little bow for my 11 year old, one he can grow into and up the draw weight as he grows.
customer_reviews.author: PassionateHunter51

customer_reviews.title: Draw string broke after very little use.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a first time bow owner. I bought this one based on other reviews. With a little help from YouTube, it was easy enough to begin adjusting the pull, draw, and sighting. I have a range right next to my home and was getting things adjusted. However, the second time I took it out to hone the sighting, the draw string broke after the first release. I guess I'm going to have to now learn how to restring it.
customer_reviews.author: Justus Winter

customer_reviews.title: Highly adjustable. Easy to adjust
customer_reviews.text: Every draw weight and length you'll need for 10 year old up to an adult hunter burly hunter in one bow. Great bow package for an unbelievable price. Peep sight will need to be installed on the string for the height of the individual hunter's eye. I had Cabela's do that, but I easily adjusted the draw length and draw weight for my 11-year old using YouTube video's and the manufacturers instructions as guides
customer_reviews.author: Atlanta2018

customer_reviews.title: Easy to adjust(I had the allen wrenches needed)
customer_reviews.text: Easy to adjust(I had the allen wrenches needed). Shoots smoothly. I do not care for the arrow rest, the fletching has to face the correct direction or it will tear up the fletching. If they put a whisker biscuit on it would not have this problem. Nice and light, easy to shoot.
customer_reviews.author: Halfshaft 911

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bow for any skill level
customer_reviews.text: Great bow, easy to set up and very friendly to shoot, esp for a beginner. Very comfortable for even a bigger person to shoot, and a bow in comfortable having grow with my skills. Diamond Archery definitely got this bow right!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Buerer

customer_reviews.title: Great bow... Would buy AGIAN
customer_reviews.text: Great bow for the money! Easy to adjust and comes with a good sight and balancer! I lost a part for it.. And the corporate company sent me a replacement part free! Love the bow! No complaints... I'd buy AGIAN
customer_reviews.author: Force Capital

customer_reviews.title: Not bad. Not great
customer_reviews.text: Good bow. Got pink for my daughter to upgrade from her youth bow. However. The bow came without a peep site. The rest was barely held on and flopping around. Thus it was NOT set up at all. Kinda sloppy. Will take a little work to just get it set up
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Eng

customer_reviews.title: Buy this Bow!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't want to invest too much money into a bow because I didn't know how far I would go with this. Everything I've read about this bow in reviews is right on. This is an excellent bow, I'm am loving it. When the bow was delivered to me I took it to the archery shop had it tuned and fitted to me and with some very helpful tips I was ready for the the range. This bow really deserves the five stars. It can be fitted to almost anyone. Excellent starter bow for target and hunting.
customer_reviews.author: Ramon Lerma

customer_reviews.title: Great starter Bow !
customer_reviews.text: Just pulled it out of the box. I have to say this bow is small but feels very well built. Very impressed with this bow and can't wait to put it to work.
customer_reviews.author: Nigel

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Bow !
customer_reviews.text: Nice bow for the money , had peep sight set up at pro shop other then that it's an off the shelf excellent bow, sight in and shoot ! I updated from an old Browing Bridger and could not belive the difference.
customer_reviews.author: S. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Bow not good, EXCELLENT cust. service
customer_reviews.text: The cam on the bow blew up in my hand, causing the string to wrap around and break skin on my forearm. Experienced archer, no dry fire, proper arrows. happened after 100-200 arrows. Received FULL REFUND which was EXCELLENT customer service. Bow was not good, customer service was EXCELLENT.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bow
customer_reviews.text: My son is 14 and recently started taking some archery classes. He really enjoys it so we decided to get him this bow. It's working out really well so far and he should be able to use it for his entire life.
customer_reviews.author: Brian P. Pfeiffer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible shipping protection
customer_reviews.text: The shipping protection was absolutely non-existent. Don't be surprised if your bow arrives damaged. There was a single 2 ft by 1ft sheet of 0.25 inch thick flexible foam that wasn't even around the bow.
customer_reviews.author: Intrepid

customer_reviews.title: Slightly disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a used bow and was misled into believing that I was purchasing the same package as the new bow with some slight blemish, the truth is that I purchased a bow only with none of the other items that came with the new package. I also cannot register the bow because I’m not the original owner.
customer_reviews.author: john f whitley jr

customer_reviews.title: Perfect starter bow for girlfriends
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my girlfriend. She loves the color and how light it is. Was a little work to sight in but works well and accurate
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Pickney

customer_reviews.title: Great bow
customer_reviews.text: The infinite Edge pro bow is awesome. The shipping was fast. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: General product experience
customer_reviews.text: The product was packaged well, ended up getting here exactly when it was promised to and was exactly as advertised. I am very pleased with my purchase and will do business with them again. Oh yeah, the bow is awesome and it shoots great. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy J.

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner bow.
customer_reviews.text: JUst received the bow in time for my husbands birthday. Haven't tried it yet as we need to get it fit but I have two of this bow just smaller and for a lefty and they are great bows for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bow. Both of my boys
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bow. Both of my boys, ages 8 and 11, shoot these. I love how they will grow with my kids. They are very accurate as well. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Josh Longley

customer_reviews.title: Works great for a starter
customer_reviews.text: Works good for target practice and shooting small game. Already upgraded to a nicer bow. This is a great starter bow though.
customer_reviews.author: edwards

customer_reviews.title: Love this bow! It's a great quality product and it's draw weight grows with you! 5 stars!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bow! It's a great quality product and it's draw weight grows with you! 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Bonita Hall

customer_reviews.title: Very low to high adjustments. Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bow for its price and had a varity of adjustments and really could put it to good use.
customer_reviews.author: Echo Congdon

customer_reviews.title: I don't like to jump into a new hobby and spend a ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't like to jump into a new hobby and spend a lot of money without being certain I'll enjoy it. At the same time, I don't like cheaping out and missing out on some important features and good quality. I like that the draw weight can go from 15-70lbs, the length is fine since I only need 28", and the added stabilizer, rest, quiver and peep sight are great for the price. Would recommend to any beginner who wants enjoy archery and not feel like they are missing anything really important when it comes to the more expensive bows.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Wrong merchandise sent
customer_reviews.text: Received wrong product, instead we received the 339.99 Black Ops bow which had a broken piece when we paid 350$ for the mossy oak bow.
customer_reviews.author: Aleigha and Matthew Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: good bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: bow all in all is good for ametuer or kids like how u can change the draw and and lbs on the fly as to wh ast u r doin the onky thing i didnt like is that it didnt come with a peep sight installed being that it is for my kid it would of been fine for him
customer_reviews.author: James Smith

customer_reviews.title: Bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: First shot at a deer (ever) dropped a 200lb 8 point at 25 yards. The arrow went straight through.. who needs to spend $1000?
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Great Bow
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my sons and they love them! I have Amazon prime so I got them for 2 day shipping. They arrived on time and no damage. So far they are pleased w/ them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it come set to the perfect draw weight and ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it come set to the perfect draw weight and length. within a hour of shooting I hit a bullseye at 40 yards
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bowtech is awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Great bow for a beginner and above. Fast, and adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: dave kokoszka

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bow
customer_reviews.text: Great Value, the infinity setting makes it nice for target practice among groups of people. well made bow
customer_reviews.author: Coconutty1983802

customer_reviews.title: Great Draw weight
customer_reviews.text: This great bow is perfect for starters and veterans. It has a draw weight range from 5-70 lbs, which you can change as you progress in archery.
customer_reviews.author: Green Mile

customer_reviews.title: Good bow that can grow with my som
customer_reviews.text: Wished it came with a quick release but that’s not enough to find fault. Son loves it!
customer_reviews.author: patricia lineberry

customer_reviews.title: Great bow
customer_reviews.text: The adjustability of this bow is great. This is a good bow for youth and adults.
customer_reviews.author: David Hammerstone

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bow! Shoots great and it's super quiet
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bow! Shoots great and it's super quiet! I did put a hindsight on it instead of installing the peep sight. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Brickles

customer_reviews.title: Best setup for the money includes everything from string silencers ...
customer_reviews.text: Best setup for the money includes everything from string silencers to a stabilizer and a sight with a quiver. Shoots excellent and provides an excellent range of poundage for any age. Recommend this anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have bow setup by a professional.
customer_reviews.text: Very good bow versatile shoots well is very accurate and easy to pull back and hold with the 80 percent letoff will make hunting much easier.
customer_reviews.author: jimmie carter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it, i'm a noob but its a great novice bow.
customer_reviews.author: Christian J. Silva

customer_reviews.title: Great Bow Great Price
customer_reviews.text: This bow is awesome. It arrived on time in perfect condition ready to go! I would definitely recommend this bow to my firiends.

customer_reviews.title: Very Very fine bow
customer_reviews.text: I like the bow very much it is light fast and accurate will be a great hunting partner. Keep up the good work Diamond.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bow is good quality, comes complete and ready to shoot. Very good buy for the money.

customer_reviews.title: Bow Does not come with peep sight installed
customer_reviews.text: Have to install peep sight yourself which is a hassle. Bow looks nice but have had better products for half the price

customer_reviews.title: Light and accurate
customer_reviews.text: All likes; simply a great bow for beginner's and pros alike

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my daughter. She is on High School hunters shooting team.

customer_reviews.title: First bow purchase
customer_reviews.text: For being my first bow, feel this has great potential in helping me grow as a novice archer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazon and We R Archery & Outdoors were great to work with
customer_reviews.text: Amazon and We R Archery & Outdoors were great to work with. Got the bow in three day. Works and preforms well. Great bow at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: ROY GOGOLIN

customer_reviews.title: Great bow for the price
customer_reviews.text: After having draw length adjusted to 29” and draw weight set to 61#, and having the peep properly installed by my local archery shop, the bow is shooting very tight and consistent groups. As you can see in the last picture, there is one group of three arrows that were touching, and a pair of arrows touching and then one stray shot in the bottom left that was my fault. But all 6 shots were within 3 inches of each other.
customer_reviews.author: Ali zand

customer_reviews.title: My husband loved the bow that my girls got him for Father's ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved the bow that my girls got him for Father's Day and got a heck Of a deal.
customer_reviews.author: arika

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: a great Bow! delivery was prompt and undamaged. will order another one .Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Lokahi Herrod

customer_reviews.title: I bought this bow for my daughter for Christmas, ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bow for my daughter for Christmas, when it arrived in couldn't believe how light and smooth the pull is on it. If I was a lefty I would be using it myself!!!
customer_reviews.author: alex hall

customer_reviews.title: Nice and lite
customer_reviews.text: Nice and lite, shoots fast and acutely. Easy to aduljust to fit your shooting style. Great starting platform to base a good hunting now off of.

customer_reviews.title: perfect for beginners and more advanced shooters
customer_reviews.text: first bow for my girlfriend. she loves it,very light and stable. and adjusts from 5 to 80 lbs with i think a 80% let off. perfect for beginners and more advanced shooters

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Shoots great right out of the box. Love the versatility of this bow

customer_reviews.title: Well crafted!
customer_reviews.text: Well crafted; perfection in all corners; easy to use...I am in love with my Infinite Edge!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bow, smooth draw
customer_reviews.text: Perfect bow, smooth draw. Let it adjusted to my needs at the bow shooting range, adjusted sights, and started shooting.

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: came in on time and has great quality, love it!
customer_reviews.author: Koby brown

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this new bow! No drawbacks so far! (Pardon the pun)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely easy to tune and a joy to shoot. Recommended for new shooters to archery.
customer_reviews.author: Kraig Bissonnette

customer_reviews.title: Good bow. Easy to adjust to your personal draw ...
customer_reviews.text: Good bow. Easy to adjust to your personal draw length and draw weight. Really accurate once you are sighted in
customer_reviews.author: jamie

customer_reviews.title: Nice bow. Adjustable weight from 5-70 lbs which is ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice bow. Adjustable weight from 5-70 lbs which is really nice especially if you don't have a bow press. 80% let-off, max draw length 31" with draw stops on the cams pressing against the string at full draw for a pretty solid wall. Peep sight wasn't installed which I didn't mind because the one they gave me was cheap, not that it wouldn't have worked, but I installed my own. Split an arrow at 10 yards this past weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Matt_97

customer_reviews.title: Great All Around Bow
customer_reviews.text: So far I can't complain. I wish there was more native measurement for the draw weight adjustment - but my digital caliper will suffice. I ordered the pro package and only did away with the arrow rest - felt a drop sight was better. The sight is not all that bad (for the time being). I don't use the bow for hunting - only for target shooting. I haven't shot it enough to finish this review. Five stars for the moment.
customer_reviews.author: mother_belgium_83

customer_reviews.title: haven't had it fitted yet but looks good out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my son, haven't had it fitted yet but looks good out of the box.

customer_reviews.title: Made one little boy very happy.
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived on time and undamaged. Made one little boy very happy.

customer_reviews.title: Great bow!
customer_reviews.text: Great bow. Especially for a beginner like myself. It's pretty much ready to use out of the box but there's are some adjustments you have to make to shoot the right way. I took it to a bow pro shop to get the adjustments done. I also recommend buying a release. All in all definitely I recommend this bow.
customer_reviews.author: Raul M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved the first one sso much, bought this one one month after buying wifes

customer_reviews.title: ... about it with my limited experience is that its perfect for my intended use
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a first time bow buyer and all i can say about it with my limited experience is that its perfect for my intended use. Its easy to adjust with basic tools. Good bow
customer_reviews.author: Rusty Shackelford

customer_reviews.title: This bow can be adjusted for everyone
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bow and very adjustable. I was able to adjust draw weight and length so that my 8yo son who is on the small side is able to use it. As he grows in strength and size this bow due to it adjustability could be used for a lifetime. I am even considering buying myself one to shoot with him.
customer_reviews.author: Korl

customer_reviews.title: 110% worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: Great bow arrived early shoot it a couple time and right out the box 1/2 inch group at 20 yards. Very smooth draw and great let off bow is amazing definitely will recommend to people this is one of the best bows I have ever owned and I have had a lot of different bows
customer_reviews.author: Mikeymikestherealoutdoors

customer_reviews.title: it was what I was looking for light and easy to pull back I had surgery on my left ...
customer_reviews.text: it was what I was looking for light and easy to pull back I had surgery on my left should and I don't have pulling it back set at 55 pounds
customer_reviews.author: angel weber

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Very adjustable. I bought this bow for my girlfriend. It was very easy to set up and adjust to her draw length and draw weight.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Great bow for the money, no buyers remorse here
customer_reviews.text: I grew up shooting rifles and shot a lot in the army so I never thought I would pick up a bow but decided I would get a bow solely to extend my hunting season so I ordered this thing and it far exceeded my expectations the draw is very smooth and and fairly accurate and all in all a very fun bow to shoot. I have found myself in the back yard shooting almost every day excellent bow for the money
customer_reviews.author: Nunyabizness

customer_reviews.title: This bow is perfect for anyone in any age group
customer_reviews.text: This bow is perfect for anyone in any age group. It comes with a site, whisker biscuit, and quiver which is great. The only thing you will have to do is put on the peep sight, but you can take it almost anywhere and they will put it on for a few dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Perttunen

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This bow is incredible, both functionally and aesthetically. I had it tuned up at my local range, and it has yet to disappoint. It's powerful, accurate, and easily adjusted, not to mention beautifully designed. Worth every penny. The bolts are all in English units, so plan accordingly when you get an Allen wrench set to tune it.
customer_reviews.author: Archer

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile
customer_reviews.text: I love this bow! I had tried it out at an archery shop prior to buying it and loved the feel and weight. It adjusts easier for weight preference, which is perfect for any level of skilled person. Whether you are still learning how to shoot or are a professional I think this is the perfect bow. I have owned several bows in the past and while they have all been wonderful, none of them compare to this. I might recommend however that you customize anything on it to fit your needs as I did. Awesome bow and very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: The package was not just the most affordable option I ...
customer_reviews.text: The package was not just the most affordable option I could find, but arrived when it was supposed to with all the parts accounted for.
customer_reviews.author: Scott McGlasson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bow!
customer_reviews.text: This a very well balanced and it is very comfortable to shoot. It came already set to about 60-65 pound pull. I love it and will buy from Diamond by Bowtech again. Good job guys! I always buy American!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: they love them.
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my two teenage daughters, they love them.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Girky

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and nice bang for the buck. As a beginner shooter--I couldn't ask for a better package.
customer_reviews.author: SJM

customer_reviews.title: nothing better on the market
customer_reviews.text: Dollar for dollar, nothing better on the market. I can adjust for my kids to shoot as well! Have a circuit pro shoot at the same range I go to and he complimented me on my choice (knowing that I'm a novice). Maybe if I go pro I'll spend a grand on a different brand, but for the foreseeable future this is the bow for me
customer_reviews.author: Squid1970

customer_reviews.title: Great bow for the price. First time shooter.
customer_reviews.text: Quick shipping and in awesome condition. Bow isn't as easy as you would think to adjust but it can be done. Highly recommend. Spent the whole day shooting it and loving every minute. If you're on the fence about a bow get this one.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Pyatt

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves the bow, however make sure to ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves the bow, however make sure to check and make sure everything is in the package as there was no peep sight or quiver.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Diamond Archery Infinite Edge Pro Bow Package
product_meta.description: If you're looking for a high quality, versatile, feature packed bow, the Infinite Edge Pro is the perfect fit. Building off Diamond's best-selling bow of all time, the Infinite Edge, we pulled out all the stops with the Infinite Edge Pro. We extended the draw length to 31"", allowing for a whole new category of shooters with longer draws. We also completely redesigned the cam system, creating a flawlessly smooth draw cycle. Then we added a solid back wall to give this bow yet another edge over the competition. And finally, we added a stabilizer for perfect balance, making the Infinite Edge Pro ready for anything. Details: Bow Type: Hunting,Recreation. Draw Length: 13-31"". IBO Speed: 310 FPS. Mass Weight3.2"" LBS. Axle to Axle Length: 31"". Brace height: 7"". Draw weight: 5-70 lbs. Effective let-off: 80%. Kinetic energy: 74.7 ft-lbs
feature_bullets: Wide draw length range between 13 and 31 inches
Accelerates arrows to up to 310 ft/sec
Redesigned cam system for a flawlessly smooth draw
Integral stabilizer creates a perfect balance and a steadier shot
Draw weight adjustable from 5 to 70 lbs of force
